data.text: ――There used to be an Umamusume called a myth.
data.processed: <story>――There used to be an Umamusume called a myth.

data.text:
15 wins out of 19 races, she is the the second Umamusume in history 
to win the Classic Triple Crown. She left a great deal of enthusiasm 
for the turf――
data.processed:
<story>15 wins out of 19 races, she is the the second Umamusume in history 
<story>to win the Classic Triple Crown. She left a great deal of enthusiasm 
<story>for the turf――

data.text:
Since then, no other Umamusume has been claimed to have 
surpassed her... The world was filled with hopes for the next myth.
data.processed:
<story>Since then, no other Umamusume has been claimed to have 
<story>surpassed her... The world was filled with hopes for the next myth.

data.text:
As if to break the somewhat deadlocked atmosphere, there was 
an Umamusume running single-mindedly in the rain.
data.processed:
<story>As if to break the somewhat deadlocked atmosphere, there was 
<story>an Umamusume running single-mindedly in the rain.

data.text: Haa, haa, haaa...!
data.processed: <story>Haa, haa, haaa...!

data.text:
She runs across the turf at a speed rarely seen before. 
The speed does not slow down, on the contrary, it gradually 
accelerates――
data.processed:
<story>She runs across the turf at a speed rarely seen before. 
<story>The speed does not slow down, on the contrary, it gradually 
<story>accelerates――

data.text: Haaaa...!
data.processed: <story>Haaaa...!

data.text:
She ran the corner, 200 meters before the finish line. 
She took a big step, lowered herself down, and took off like a spring.
data.processed:
<story>She ran the corner, 200 meters before the finish line. 
<story>She took a big step, lowered herself down, and took off like a spring.

data.text:
The eye-widening speed accelerates further, further, further. 
Common sense is left behind.
data.processed:
<story>The eye-widening speed accelerates further, further, further. 
<story>Common sense is left behind.

data.text:
Shaking the earth and splashing the rain, the Umamusume 
runs like the wind. She was so vivid that I found myself 
forgetting to breathe――
data.processed:
<story>Shaking the earth and splashing the rain, the Umamusume 
<story>runs like the wind. She was so vivid that I found myself 
<story>forgetting to breathe――

data.text:
...Haa, haaaa.... phewー! 
Ahー! As expected, it's not enough without somebody else.
data.processed:
<story>...Haa, haaaa.... phewー! 
<story>Ahー! As expected, it's not enough without somebody else.

data.text: But who comes to the field on a day like this?
data.processed: <story>But who comes to the field on a day like this?

data.text:
...Too much of such a shock, my heart was beating fast, 
my legs trembled and I couldn't leave.
data.processed:
<story>...Too much of such a shock, my heart was beating fast, 
<story>my legs trembled and I couldn't leave.

data.text:
If we were to run the Twinkle Series together, we would be able 
to see a view that cannot be seen anywhere else. Such confidence 
is growing.

choices.text: (I have to go scouting right now!)

data.processed:
<story>If we were to run the Twinkle Series together, we would be able 
<story>to see a view that cannot be seen anywhere else. Such confidence 
<story>is growing.

data.text: Hey! You, you!
data.processed: <story>Hey! You, you!

data.text:
Are you free right now? 
I'll take you for a run with me――
data.processed:
<story>Are you free right now? 
<story>I'll take you for a run with me――

data.text: Huh? You're a trainer.
data.processed: <story>Huh? You're a trainer.

data.text:
Sorry, sorry, I couldn't see well because of the rain. 
I made a mistake, see you later!
data.processed:
<story>Sorry, sorry, I couldn't see well because of the rain. 
<story>I made a mistake, see you later!

data.text: Hm?

choices.text: C-could you become my assigned Umamusume?

data.processed: <story>Hm?

data.text:
I feel like I was in too much of a hurry, but timing is important 
for everything. I used all the words I had to convey the emotion 
I just felt.
data.processed:
<story>I feel like I was in too much of a hurry, but timing is important 
<story>for everything. I used all the words I had to convey the emotion 
<story>I just felt.

data.text:
The speed was so fast that I couldn't help but stop and watch, 
thinking that I would be able to see a view that couldn't be seen 
anywhere else.
data.processed:
<story>The speed was so fast that I couldn't help but stop and watch, 
<story>thinking that I would be able to see a view that couldn't be seen 
<story>anywhere else.

data.text:
After all this talk, I realized that I hadn't said anything convincible. 
I had to come up with an example――

choices.text: The Classic Triple Crown is not just a dream!
choices.processed: <size=37>The Classic Triple Crown is not just a dream!</size>

data.processed:
<story>After all this talk, I realized that I hadn't said anything convincible. 
<story>I had to come up with an example――

data.text: ...I see, thank you. But, I'm sorry.
data.processed: <story>...I see, thank you. But, I'm sorry.

data.text: It failed.
data.processed: <story>It failed.

data.text: That's Mr. C.B., isn't it!
data.name: Rookie Trainer A
data.processed: <story>That's Mr. C.B., isn't it!

data.text:
Rumor has it that her mother was a famous Umamusume and her 
father was her trainer! I heard a rumor about her daughter 
before she entered the school.
data.name: Rookie Trainer A
data.processed:
<story>Rumor has it that her mother was a famous Umamusume and her 
<story>father was her trainer! I heard a rumor about her daughter 
<story>before she entered the school.

data.text:
When I saw her in person, she was very talented, and she also had 
an unconventional running style. So, I think she may be the next 
Umamusume to win the Triple Crown――
data.name: Rookie Trainer A
data.processed:
<story>When I saw her in person, she was very talented, and she also had 
<story>an unconventional running style. So, I think she may be the next 
<story>Umamusume to win the Triple Crown――

data.text:
No, I think they can be more than a myth! 
There is no end to the number of trainers who are looking 
to scout her.
data.name: Rookie Trainer A
data.processed:
<story>No, I think they can be more than a myth! 
<story>There is no end to the number of trainers who are looking 
<story>to scout her.

data.text:
...But, it seems she has turned down hundreds of trainers so far. 
I don't really know what kind of trainer she wants.
data.name: Rookie Trainer A
data.processed:
<story>...But, it seems she has turned down hundreds of trainers so far. 
<story>I don't really know what kind of trainer she wants.

data.text:
It seems she was more popular than I had imagined. 
As my shoulders slumped, my colleague dropped 
her voice meaningfully.
data.processed:
<story>It seems she was more popular than I had imagined. 
<story>As my shoulders slumped, my colleague dropped 
<story>her voice meaningfully.

data.text:
This is just a guess, but... the fact they're turning everyone down 
means that you weren't turned down because of you.
data.name: Rookie Trainer A
data.processed:
<story>This is just a guess, but... the fact they're turning everyone down 
<story>means that you weren't turned down because of you.

data.text:
I'm sure it's still too early to give up. If you've been rejected once, 
now's your chance to show how enthusiastic you are... right?
data.name: Rookie Trainer A
data.processed:
<story>I'm sure it's still too early to give up. If you've been rejected once, 
<story>now's your chance to show how enthusiastic you are... right?

data.text: And so――
data.processed: <story>And so――

data.text: What? A present? Heh, thank you!
data.name: Mr. C.B.
data.processed: <story>What? A present? Heh, thank you!

data.text:
Let's see... is this a... training plan? I see, you have put 
together a plan specifically for me!
data.name: Mr. C.B.
data.processed:
<story>Let's see... is this a... training plan? I see, you have put 
<story>together a plan specifically for me!

data.text:
Is that a horse shoe? Wow, custom made! 
Hey, it seems like it puts less strain on your toes. 
Thank goodness for that.
data.name: Mr. C.B.
data.processed:
<story>Is that a horse shoe? Wow, custom made! 
<story>Hey, it seems like it puts less strain on your toes. 
<story>Thank goodness for that.

data.text:
I talked to her instructor and also scoured the mock race 
results to give her the gift I had prepared.
data.processed:
<story>I talked to her instructor and also scoured the mock race 
<story>results to give her the gift I had prepared.

data.text: But... I'm sorry, I cannot accept this.
data.name: Mr. C.B.
data.processed: <story>But... I'm sorry, I cannot accept this.

data.text:
If I take it, you'll get your hopes up. 
I'm not good at that, sorry.
data.name: Mr. C.B.
data.processed:
<story>If I take it, you'll get your hopes up. 
<story>I'm not good at that, sorry.

data.text: So, I'll just take your feelings. Thank you!
data.name: Mr. C.B.
data.processed: <story>So, I'll just take your feelings. Thank you!

data.text: She quickly turned me down, and sank for a second time.
data.processed: <story>She quickly turned me down, and sank for a second time.
